$eref.description: Common properties and behavior across all Cyber Observable Objects.
$eref.title: core

___description.description: Specifies a textual description of the Object.

___extensions.description: Specifies any extensions of the object, as a dictionary.

___type.description: Indicates that this object is an Observable Object. The value of this property MUST be a valid Observable Object type name, but to allow for custom objects this has been removed from the schema.
The value of this property MUST be `ipv4-addr`.

___resolves_to_refs.description: Specifies a list of references to one or more Layer 2 Media Access Control (MAC) addresses that the IPv4 address resolves to.

___value.description: Specifies one or more IPv4 addresses expressed using CIDR notation.

___belongs_to_refs.description: Specifies a reference to one or more autonomous systems (AS) that the IPv4 address belongs to.

description: The IPv4 Address Object represents one or more IPv4 addresses expressed using CIDR notation.
title: ipv4-addr
